ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Public Health Institution Health Center of Skopje

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: Public Health Institution Health Center of Skopje

CA_CE_CONCESSIONAIRE_PROFILE.CONTACT_POINT: Public Health Institution Health Center of Skopje

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Procurement of service for servicing, maintenance and repair of official motor vehicles

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Procurement of service for servicing, maintenance and repair of official motor vehicles for the needs of PHI Healthcare Center of Skopje – Skopje.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Servicing, maintenance and repair of different types of official motor vehicles
Servicing, maintenance and repair of ambulance motor vehicles (Renault Trafic L2H2P2 2.0dCi 115hp) for emergency medical assistance
Servicing, maintenance and repair of motor vehicle Skoda Citigo Ambition 1.0 Mpi and Skoda Yeti Ambition 2.0 TDI

EXISTENCE_OTHER_PARTICULAR_CONDITIONS.P: Guarantee for quality performance of the contract: yes (5,00 %)

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: In order to prove its personal condition the economic operator is obliged to submit the following documents:
— statement of the economic operator that in the past five years it was not rendered a final judgment for participation in criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— confirmation by a competent organ that a bankruptcy procedure was not opened,
— confirmation by a competent organ that a liquidation procedure was not opened,
— confirmation for paid taxes, contributions and other public duties by a competent organ in the country where the economic operator was registered,

— certificate from the registry of penalties for crimes committed by legal persons that minor penalty ban on participation in public tender procedures, awarding contracts and agreements for public-private partnership has not been imposed on him,
— certificate from the registry of penalties for crimes committed by legal persons that a minor penalty for temporary or permanent prohibition of a specific activity has not been imposed over him,
— confirmation that a final judgment - prohibition of professional activity or duty, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing professional activity has not been imposed over him.
Capacity for performing professional activity of economic operator:

In order to prove its capacity for performing professional activity, the economic operator should submit a document for registered activity as an evidence that it is registered as a legal entity for performing the activity related to the public procurement subject or an evidence that it belongs to relevant professional association in accordance to the regulations of the country where it is registered.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: 1— In the past 3 (three) years (2014, 2013 and 2012) the economic operator has concluded contracts with clients for performing services of maintenance and repair of motor vehicles and to submit at least 3 confirmations for quality contract execution.
2— The economic operator should own an equipped servicing facility for performing the subject service as follows:
—— minimum 3 (three) winches with capacity of min. 2,5 t,
—— minimum 1 canal with canal winch,
—— diagnostic OBD device(s) that may register and delete code errors for all vehicles for which the applicant applies.
— Basic mechanical tools,
— basic electronic tools,
— gas analyzer for gasoline and diesel engines,
— machine for tires change and balancing,
— machine for centering of a vehicle management system,
— machine for adding and changing freon in a cooling system,
— device for extraction of vehicles,
— basic tools for sheet painting,
— basic tools for glass change,
— electronic catalogues for procurement of original spare parts for all vehicles the applicant applies,
— electronic maintenance manuals by the vehicle producer for which the applicant applies
— software application for electronic registering and analytics for maintenance of vehicles being applied for with possibility for running an electronic file /history for the maintained vehicle.

The economic operator shall submit a Statement confirming that it has at disposal an equipped service facility in accordance to the subject requirements for proving its technical and professional capacity.
3— The economic operator shall submit a statement that it owns a parking area with minimum 3 parking lots and 24 hours option for acceptance of a non-operational vehicle.

4— The economic operator shall submit a statement that it owns a warehouse with stock of spare parts and supplies with possibility the spare parts that are not found in stock to be procured in a deadline not longer than 10 working days.

5— The economic operator shall submit a statement that it shall incorporate original spare parts and supplies or parts with equivalent quality that meet the production specifications and quality standards of the vehicle produces.
6— The economic operator shall submit a statement that it has full-time professional and technical employees who would be engaged for the realization of the procurement subject as follows:
— minimum 2 (two) professional auto-mechanics with high-school education,
— minimum 1 (one) professional auto-electrician with high-school education,
— minimum 1 (one) professional car tinsmiths,
— minimum 1 (one) auto lacquer.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: In order to qualify as capable of performing the subject public procurement contract from the aspect of its technical or professional capacity, the economic operator should meet the following minimum conditions:
1— experience in relevant previous rendered services,

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: The contracting organ shall use electronic auction as a last phase in the open procedure. Subject of the auction is the lowest offered total price for each part of the public procurement contract subject, i.e. the lowest price of the acceptable bids submitted in the initial phase of the procedure. The invitations for participation at the auction shall be submitted in electronic form through ESJN after full evaluation of the initial bids, to all economic operators that submitted acceptable bids in the first phase of the procedure. The invitations for participation at the auction shall be submitted in electronic form via ESJN, after full evaluation of the initial bids, to all economic operators that submitted acceptable bids in the first phase of the procedure. The invitation for participation at the auction shall contain the following data: starting price of the auction, i.e. the lowest price of the initially submitted bids; date and hour of beginning and the ending of auction; the interval in which the negative bidding shall take place (minimum and maximum difference in the offered prices); as well as the current ranking of the bidder made on the basis of the initially submitted price. More information regarding the electronic auction is contained in the tender documentation.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: PHI Healthcare Center of Skopje - Polyclinic Bit Pazar - Second floor, Meeting Hall, address Krste Misirkov Bld nº 28, 1000 Skopje-R.Macedonia

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: The authorized persons of the economic operators should submit a Power of Attorney in order to attend and take active participation in the public opening of bids
